tutorial: Testing a Trading Idea - The Trigger Stage
type: Tutorial Step - Do You Have The Data?

definition.text: If you didn't do the second tutorial in the series, chances are you are missing the data you need to do this one!

paragraphs.text: If you did the second tutorial, you can skip the data mining! If you didn't, then proceed!
The sensor bot will run on the BTC/USDT market (Binance) from January 1st, 2020.
If you have data on this market but on a different time range, this may affect your data! Read the sensor bot documentation to learn how!
